content.title: Intro
content.content:
1994
Preceded by
1994
1995
Year
1996
Followed by
1996

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1995.

content.title: January
content.content:
1 - Proceedings of the J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference is published.
11 - Actor Peter Pratt dies.

content.title: February
content.content:
6 - Actor Frank Duncan dies.
7 - Actor Tom Glynn-Carney is born.
16 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 4 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
21 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 5 is published.
30 - Actor Michael Graham Cox dies.

content.title: May
content.content:
2 - Actor Michael Hordern dies.
? - Amon Hen 133 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
4-7 - Mythcon 26.
8 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 6 is published.
8 - Parma Eldalamberon issue 11 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
27 - J.R.R. Tolkien: Artist and Illustrator is published.
30 - Actor Andy Pessoa is born.

content.title: November
content.content:
12 - Actor Robert Stephens dies.
20 - Ebba-Margareta von Freymann, a German poetess who translated most of Tolkien's songs and poems into German, dies.
22 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 7 is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien (Writers and Their Work) is published.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 37 is published.

? - Peter Jackson and Fran Walsh discuss making a fantasy film based on Tolkien's works.
? - The Tolkien Ensemble is founded.
? - Middle-earth Collectible Card Game is introduced.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1996 is released.
Years
1992 1993 1994 1995 1996 1997 1998
